p.o: Notes: JAC retired teacher; interested in Irish language, had visited Dublin and purchased Dinneen’s dictionary in Hodges Figgis bookshop). Tendency to correct pronunciation of sr- from [str-] to [sr-]. Both he and brother [name?] fluent, competent Gaelic-speakers. Informant and bro. illustrate how Irish surnames (as also Dunne, Farrell, Coady) are to be encountered among the last surviving Gaelic-speakers in Cape Breton. Many more have Irish family heritage on their mothers’ and grandmothers’ side. Their Irish forebears would often have come from Louisbourg or across from Newfoundland.

list.label: làmh [ʁ̫ã:v] n.f.
list.item: ‘hand’: dat. sg. na làimh [ɫ˻ãĩ˼v]; pl. làmhan, na ~ [nə ʁ̫ã:hun].
list.label: lampa n.
le prep.
list.item: ‘with, by’: le ~ eagal ‘in case’; pron. 1sg. leam [ʎ˻øu˼m]; 2sg. leat [ʎɛht]; 3sg. m. leis [lɛʃ]: dh’fhalbh e ~ [ɣɔɫàv a lɛʃ]; 1pl. leinn [ʎi:ɲ] (rinn [ri:ɲ] also given); 2pl. leibh [l ́i:v] (sic); 3pl. emph. leotha-san [l ́ɛhɔ̝ sən].
list.label: leaba [ʎɛpə] n.
leacann (lethcheann) [ʎɛxkən] n.
leas n.
list.item: : cha ruig thu ~ [ha rui̯k ́ u ʎɛs] thu ‘you don’t need to’.
list.label: leathad [ʎehət] n.
lios [ʎis] n.
litir [ʎiʧər ́] n.f.
lom adj.
list.item: ‘bare, empty’: bha ’n taigh sin ~ [ʁ̫˻ɔu˼m]; tha ’n t-achadh sin ~.
list.label: luing [ɫ˻ɤi˼ŋk ́] (long) n.
mac [mɑxk] n.
marbh adj.
list.item: ‘dead’: pl. as n. na mairbh [nə maràv] (?).
list.label: milis [mil ́iʃ] adj.
mise pron. 1sg. emph.
list.item: ‘big, large’: f. dat. sg. leis an t-sùil mhòr [lɛʃ ən thu:l võ:r]; gen. pl. dath na ~ mhòr [ta nə su:l võ:r]; cpv. nas motha nas mo.
list.label: mòran n.
muc mharadh [muxk vãrəɣ] n.
muing [m˻øi˼ŋ ́g ́] n.
muir n.f.
list.item: ‘sea’: gen. maradh, seòladairean na maradh [nə marəɣ]. SEE ALSO muc mharadh.
list.label: mun / mum
nàbaidh n.
namhaid [navɛʧ] n.
nathair n.f.
list.item: ‘snake’: gen. sg. eireaball na nathair bheag nə [nahir ́ vek].
list.label: nighean [ɲ˻i·ɑ˼n] n.f.
nighneag [ɲi:nak] n.f.
niod (nead) [ɲɩt] n.
raon [ʀɯ:n] n.
list.item: ‘range’: ~ mòr, mòran acraichean do dh’fhearann; pl. raointean [ʀɯ:nʧhən] ‘prairies’.
list.label: reamhar [rɛhur] adj.
ri prep.
list.item: ‘to, at, by’: pron. 1sg. rium [r ́i̯um], emph. rium-sa [r ́i̯u:msə]; 2sg. riut [ri̯u:ht], emph. riut-sa [ri̯u:htsə]; 3sg. m. ris [r ́iʃ], emph. ri-sean [r ́isən] (sic); 1pl. rinn [r ́˻øi˼ɲ]; 2pl. ribh [ri:v]; 3pl. riutha [r ́i̯u-u].
list.label: rìogh [ʀi:ɣ] n.
ruig vb.
list.item: ‘reach’: fut. dep. cha ~ thu leas [ha rui̯k ́ u ʎɛs] ‘you don’t need to’.
list.label: ruith [rui̯ʔ] vb.
list.item: ‘run’: ipv.2sg. na ruith! [nah (sic) rui̯]; fut. dep. cha ruith [xa rui̯].

list.label: sàmhach [sã:həx] adj.
samhradh n.
list.item: ‘summer’: dat. sg. anns an t-~ [ans ən thãũrəɣ]; pl. ~aichean [s˻ãũ˼riçən].
list.label: saoghal n.
saor adj.
list.item: ‘cheap’: cpv.: na bu shaoire [na pə sɯ:r ́ə].
list.label: sealg [ʃɛʁ̫ àk] n.f.
list.item: ‘hunt’; dat.sg. air an t-seilg [ɛr ən ʧhɛl ́èk ́].
list.label: sealgair [ʃɛʁ̫àkɛr ́] n.
sealladh [ʃɛʁ̫əɣ] n.
seann adj.
list.item: ‘old’: cpv. nas sine [nas ʃi:nə]; supltv. ’s e as sine uile [ʃ ɛ əs ʃi:nə ju ul ́ə].
list.label: seas vb.
seòladair n.
list.item: : pl. ~ean na maradh [ʃ˻ɛu˼ʁ̫ ətar ́ən nə marəɣ] ‘[sea-going] sailors’.
list.label: sibh pron. 1pl.
list.item: : tha ~ [ʃi:v] a’ dol; emph. sibhse, tha sibhse [ʃi:ʃəɣ] a’ dol.
list.label: sinn pron. 1pl.
list.item: : tha ~ [ʃi:ɲ] a’ dol; emph. sinneadh, tha sinneadh [ʃiɲəɣ] a’ dol.
list.label: siud pron. deict.
sleamhain [slɛʔuɲ] adj.
snaidhm n.
sùil n.f. n.
list.item: ‘eye’: dat. sg. leis an t-sùil mhòr [lɛʃ ən thu:l võ:r] gen. pl. dath na ~ mhòr [ta nə su:l võ:r].

list.label: taigh n.
talamh n.f.
teanga n.
teth [t ́he] adj.
list.item: ‘hot’: cpv. nas ~ [nas t ́he] / nas teotha [nas t ́h˻eo˼].
list.label: teud [ʧhe:t] n.
thusa pron. 2sg. emph.
till vb.
list.item: ‘return’: fut. dep. cha ~ [xa ʧhi:ʎ]; mun ~ mi [mɤn ʧhi:ʎ mi]; mura ~ mi [mɤrə ʧhi:ʎ mi].
list.label: tobair n.
toll n.
tom [tɔ̃ũm] n.
tonn [tɔ̃ũn] n.
trì [thri]: num.
trom adj.
list.item: ‘heavy’: cpv.: na bu troime [na pə thr˻øi˼mə].
list.label: truimead [thr˻øi˼mət] n.
uile [ul ́ə] adj.
list.item: ‘all’: ’s e as sine ~ [ʃɛ əs ʃi:nə ju ul ́ə].
list.label: uisge n.
ur poss. adj. 2pl.
